Other distribution: India ( Assam , W. Bengal), Bangladesh , Malaysia (W.), Sri Lanka , Taiwan , Vietnam . (2)

Taxonomy: The genus
Microperus Wood
was placed in synonymy with
Coptodryas
in Wood and Bright (1992) . The genus was reinstated by
Hulcr et al. (2007a)
.

Illustrations: D (
Maiti & Saha 2004
as
Coptodryas alpha
).
